title: Fact Check: Aaj Tak did not play Burnol ad while covering Ram Mandir Bhoomi Pujan | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A screenshot of TV News Channel, Aaj Tak’s coverage of Ram Mandir Bhoomi Pujan is being shared on social media.

In the screenshot, the advertisement of Burnol can be seen playing along with the ceremony.

NewsMobile fact-checked the post and found the claim to be false.

We checked for the coverage of Aaj Tak on their YouTube channel and found several videos dated August 5, 2020.

Upon analysing the videos carefully, we noticed that Burnol advertisement was not played during the coverage.

Moreover, we also found a tweet by the channel, clarifying that the post is fake.

Hence, from the above information, it is clear that the post in question is false.
